name: LibreOffice
description: LibreOffice is an office suite with powerful functions. It can be used for text, spreadsheet, presentation, drawing, database and mathematical expression editing and processing. LibreOffice has powerful data import and export function, which can directly import PDF documents, Microsoft Works, and support major OpenXML format.

en_US.description: LibreOffice is an office suite with powerful functions. It can be used for text, spreadsheet, presentation, drawing, database and mathematical expression editing and processing. LibreOffice has powerful data import and export function, which can directly import PDF documents, Microsoft Works, and support major OpenXML format.
en_US.name: LibreOffice

zh_CN.description: LibreOffice是一款功能强大的办公套件，可用于文本文档、电子表格、演示文稿、绘图、数据库以及数学公式编辑和处理，libreoffice拥有强大的数据导入和导出功能，能直接导入PDF文档、微软Works，支持主要的OpenXML格式。
zh_CN.name: LibreOffice
